com.knowgate.dataxslt

Class StylesheetCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.knowgate.dataxslt.StylesheetCache

  • public class StylesheetCache
extends java.lang.Object
    XSL File Cache This class keeps a master copy in memory of each XSL Stylesheet file.
    When a Transformer object is requested a copy of the master Stylesheet is done. This is faster than re-loading de XSL file from disk.
    StylesheetCache is a WeakHashMap so cached stylesheets can be automatically garbage collected is memory runs low.
    Version:
    7.0

      • newTransformer

        public static javax.xml.transform.Transformer newTransformer(java.lang.String sFilePath)
                                                      throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                             java.io.IOException,
                                                             javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                                             javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        Get Transformer object for XSL file. StylesheetCache automatically checks file last modification date and compares it with loading date for cached objects. If file is more recent than its cached object then the disk copy is reloaded.
        Parameters:
        sFilePath - File Path
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • setParameters

        public static void setParameters(javax.xml.transform.Transformer oXSL,
                 java.util.Properties oProps)
                          throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Set parameters for a StyleSheet taken from a properties collection. This method is primarily designed for setting environment parameters.
        Parameters:
        oXSL - Transformer object.
        oProps - Properties to be set as parameters. The substring "param_" will be added as a preffix to each property name passed as parameter. So if you pass a property named "workarea" it must be retrieved from XSL as <xsl:param name="param_workarea"/>
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if oXSL is null or oProps is null

                             javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                             javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
        Perform XSLT transformation
        Parameters:
        sStyleSheetPath - File Path to XSL style sheet file
        oXMLInputStream - Input Stream for XML source data
        oOutputStream - Stream where output is to be written
        oProps - Parameters for Transformer. The substring "param_" will be added as a preffix to each property name passed as parameter. So if you pass a property named "workarea" it must be retrieved from XSL as <xsl:param name="param_workarea"/>
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if oProps is null
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if sStyleSheetPath does not exist
